name: Dad and Dad's Bakery
description:
Express yourself through the medium of cake decorating and show the world why Dad and Dad's Bakery is the best in the business!

Development time - around 4 hours

Controls:

  • Click on the cake to place a decoration
  • Esc to quit

Credits:

- Lee Esplin @NiceAndCoolLee
